name: Leapoundary
description:
This game was made for GameOff 2019 game jam (theme: "Leaps and bounds"). All the assets were made by myself apart from:

  • https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/gui/icons/clean-vector-icons-132084
  • https://github.com/Elringus/SpriteGlow
How to play:

All you need is a mouse. Click in the direction you want to send the ball. Try to reach next blue circles by shooting towards them or bouncing off walls. But most important, have fun!

Later I plan on making a mobile version of that game ;)

Software used:
  • Photoshop
  • Unity 2019.3 (beta)
  • LMMS
  • GitHub: https://github.com/Manus9696/Leapoundary

Thanks to everyone who played my game. I hope you experienced even a little joy by playing it :) Share your scores in the comments :D
